text:
ESO Solutions | full-time | Austin, TX | ONSITE | https://esosolutions.com

How would you like to work at an incredibly cool company where every day, you get the chance to do something that really matters?

At ESO, we make software that helps emergency medical services, fire departments and hospitals take better care of patients. The work we do literally helps save lives and improve community health.

Our team is made up of technologists, medical experts, data gurus, photographers, foodies, dog lovers, cyclists, and aspiring guitarists â€“ all united by our passion for what we do. We embrace a culture of openness and collaboration, where people lead with ideas, not job titles.

If you're the kind of person who believes in applying your talents to make the world a better place, we'd be honored to hear from you.

We are looking for: - Software Developer in Test - http://www.esosolutions.com/about/sdet-qa-engineer - .NET Developer - http://www.esosolutions.com/about/net-developer
